dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 839 IH: To prohibit the implementation of a Land Protection Plan for Muleshoe National Wildlife Refuge.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Arrington introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To prohibit the implementation of a Land Protection Plan for Muleshoe National Wildlife Refuge.

section.header: Implementation of Land Protection Plan for Muleshoe National Wildlife Refuge prohibited
section.text: The Secretary of the Interior may not finalize, implement, administer, or enforce the Land Protection Plan described in the document published by the United States Fish and Wildlife Service titled Final Land Protection Plan & Environmental Assessment Muleshoe National Wildlife Refuge (February 2023).
